game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Human
          • game.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class Player
extends Human
    Class representing the Player. The player is able to input the action it wants to perform each turn.
    Author:
    weijianlai

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              char displayChar,

        Constructor.
        Parameters:

        displayChar - Character to represent the player in the UI

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Return an Action to be performed during its turn. The player will have a list of actions to be performed that will be printed in a menu for the player to select. The lists of actions that the player can perform are such as choosing direction to move to, attacking the enemy, harvesting crops, eating food and etc.
        Overrides:
        playTurn in class Human
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current player is
        display - the Display where the player's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • isStunned

        public boolean isStunned()
        Returns true if the player is stunned by checking if the player is stunned.
        Parameters:
        map - map which the player is on
        Returns:
        true if and only if the player is stunned that contain the stun item in its inventory.

      • updateStunnedStatus

        private void updateStunnedStatus(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions)
        Updates the stunned status by decreasing the count by 1 if it is stunned and forces the player to skip its turn. Otherwise, it removes the stun item from the player's location.
        Parameters:
        actions - a list of actions to be returned
        map - the map which the player is on

      • hasBattery

        public boolean hasBattery()
        check if the player's inventory contains the item Battery by checking its itemCapability. Return true if the player's inventory contains the item and false if it's not inside.
